text: Hi <@U01LS6HLCUS>. Pleasure to meet you! The next step after creating an app would be to list it on the marketplace: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/listing-your-app>

The App Accelerator is meant to inspire the creation of new apps & help you build said apps which will go live in May. If you have something ready to go, I certainly don't want to hold you back from getting this listed. If you're ready to list it in the next few weeks, let me know and I'll connect you with an app partner manager. If the app is still in development and you are OK going live in a few months, let me know and we'll get you involved in the Accelerator.
Hi <@U01E3RBUSTD> thank you so much! Yes, I think we would be ready to go live within a few weeks. So connecting with an app partner manager would be very helpful for sure. :smiley::pray:
Perfect! I just sent an email introducing you to Jake Morgen. He'll be able to help you get the app shipped in a few weeks
Thank you, really appreciate your attention to this.
